name: Fintotal Insights and Resources
overview:
Fintotal.com, a no nonsense finance portal has revamped its site to make it more user friendly and easy maneuvering for articles. The articles are written in such a way that a layman or a person from non-finance background can easily understand. One of the best features of the site is its uncluttered and ad-free layout,unlike other personal finance websites.

We understand that,

• Majority of the people feel Finance is confusing and complicated • Employees feel their income is not sufficient to meet their Financial goals • Lot of us are not left with any surplus money at the end of the every month

So, Here we are in a MISSION to address these concerns and GUIDE them by giving NEUTRAL, UNBIASED and a CLEAR CUT opinion and views.

We believe that with basic and adequate financial knowledge, tremendous benefits can be realized.

So we are committed in making it achievable, by providing guidance, support and tools for those who are part of this community. We want to make Finance easy and the knowledge accessible to a common man.
